channel.title: Carloop plus Car Loop GPS
channel.description: I've purchased an Electron, a Carloop, and a Carloop GPS. I am able to find lots of examples of how to configure and use everything but the Accelerometer. Is there an example for the accell? Is it pinned the same way as the AssetTracker? Can I use the Adafruit_LIS3DH library?

item.title: Carloop plus Car Loop GPS
item.dc:creator: itsmedavid
item.description:
Here is an example but for the Gyro, maybe it will give you some lights for the accell Gyro in gps module? - Hardware - Carloop Community

Can you share the examples that you got?

Thanks.

Read full topic
